document_data.name: ''Acid Bomb''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Acid bombs''''' were vials of highly reactive [[acid]] that could be used as deadly thrown [[grenade]]-like weapons.
document_data.Description: Simple in design, when shattered, ''acid bomb'' vials explode into dangerously corrosive clouds of acid fog.
document_data.History: In the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], ''acid bombs'' were common weapons encountered on the [[Sword Coast]], [[Delimbiyr Vale]], [[Underdark]], and many other places.
